title: Are the 10 days of Dhul hijjah better than Ramadan? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: salhen from canada he says isn't it that the 10 days of rama of of the hija in the morning better than the 10 night better than the 10 days of ramadan in the morning and the ten nights of ramadan at night are better than the ten nights of the ten of the hija at night this is what some scholars try to combine both opinions by but the hadith is crystal clear the best days of the whole world is the ten days of the hijanalano's best you
